Description: Amica agreed to pay over $800,000 in restitution, resolving allegations that it overcharged consumers for motorcycle insurance.

Notes: Link is to summary of Order, suspended or shared liability for penalties not available.

Agency: New York Department of Financial Services

Description: $20,000 fine levied, with $10,000 suspended and Compliance Plan ordered, for allowing unlicensed and non-appointed producers to transact the business of insurance and paying commissions to unlicensed producers, thereby violating RCW 48.17.060(1); RCW 48.17.490(1); RCW 48.17.160(1); WAC 284-17-429(4)...
Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner
